name: Against All Odds (Running Pillow)
description:
Against All Odds is a survival card game where you combine cards to explore, collect resources & food, discover new recipes to build new stuff and fight creatures.

Simply start by dragging your Survivor card on top of a Grasslands card to explore it. New cards will spawn which you can combine to move forward with exploration and survival!


Features 🔥

  • 🃏  50+ Cards to discover
  • 💡 Discover hidden features of each card
  • 📘 Simple to learn yet strategic gameplay
  • 🕒 1-3 hours of playtime

Discover new blueprints

Discover new blueprints to craft by stacking matching cards on top of each other

Fight

Each enemy drains your Sanity, fight them alone or team up with your allies!

Nuclear winter radiation

You need to plan ahead what you want to build and explore before the radiation hits!

We need feedback!

  • Game is in an active development stage. We need a feedback from players on which direction should the development take
  • Get in touch with us and participate in live development at our Discord
